title: Analyze Google News scraper code
description: Review the existing Google News scraper code to understand its functionality, identify potential issues, and determine areas for improvement.

title: Analyze Google News scraper issues
description: Analyze the current state of the Google News scraper and sentiment analyzer to identify any remaining issues after the timestamp fix.

title: Fix timestamp serialization and deserialization
description: Address the timestamp handling issue in the data pipeline, ensuring proper serialization to JSON and correct parsing back into datetime objects when loaded for analysis.
